subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Fernando Alonso produced Ferrari’s first victory of the Formula One season at the British Grand Prix in Silverstone, England, after the Grand Prix leader, Sebastian Vettel of Red Bull, was hindered by a pit-stop blunder.
snippet: Fernando Alonso produced Ferrari’s first victory of the Formula One season at the British Grand Prix in Silverstone, England, after the Grand Prix leader, Sebastian Vettel of Red Bull, was hindered by a pit-stop blunder.
